about_the_game:
Journey to the West 2021 is a traditional large-scale turn role-playing game. This game tells the legendary story of Monk Tang's teachers and disciples going to the west to worship Buddha and seek scriptures and subdue demons and Demons along the way.

In this work, there are 15 chapters of orthodox script:

Turn system and special playing methods

In this work, thousands of enemy demons come on stage. Enemy demons will release special skills with the increase of level.

In this work, we can collect a variety of items through plot and hiding, and use them in battle to strengthen our army's combat ability.

In this work, the number of hidden items that can be found is close to hundreds.

In this work, a variety of treasures can be obtained through script and hiding. These treasures can be used to improve our combat ability.

In this work, the skills of each role are unique, and each role can play its own function.

In this work, the equipment can be upgraded through specific props. The upgraded equipment may have a new hidden effect.

In this work, combat data statistics are provided to see the benefits obtained by players in combat.

Chapter 1 Gao Laozhuang subdues Zhu Bajie


Monkey King and Tang Seng came to gaolaozhuang this day. The villa leader's son-in-law Zhu Bajie was found to be a pig demon by monkey king. After several fights, Monkey King subdued Zhu Bajie. Later, he learned that Zhu Bajie was the person appointed by Guanyin to protect Tang Seng's scriptures. Tang Seng accepted Bajie as his apprentice. After saying goodbye to the villa leader, the teachers and apprentices continued to embark on the journey of scriptures.

Chapter 2 Liushahe subdues monk Sha and little white dragon


The Tang Monk's teachers and disciples came to the Liusha river. Unexpectedly, the Liusha river was deep and wide. The teachers and disciples couldn't cross the river for a moment. Suddenly, a boat appeared along the river. The teachers and disciples crossed the river by boat. On the way, the river demon overturned the boat using magic and grabbed the Tang monk. Wukong learned from Bajie that the water god bead can separate the river, so he went to the East China Sea to borrow the water god bead. After separating the river, Wukong and Bajie went to the cave of the monster at the bottom of the river to rescue master. There are two river demons, one is monk Sha and the other is little white dragon. After Wukong and Bajie subdued the two river demons, Guanyin appeared. Finally, the two river demons were enlightened by Guanyin and became Tang Monk's disciples. After the rest of Tang Monk's teachers and disciples, they continued to embark on the journey of learning scriptures.

Chapter 3 adventure of Flame Mountain


Tang Monk's teachers and disciples came to the flame mountain. The flame mountain was very hot. There was a raging fire on the mountain. Tang Monk and others couldn't pass for a while. Wukong learned from the mouth of the land that the fire in this mountain can be fanned out with Princess Iron Fan's banana fan. Then Wukong went to the banana cave to find Princess Iron Fan to borrow the banana fan. Princess Iron Fan asked Wukong to help her find the red boy, and then borrowed the banana fan to Wukong. After some exploration, Wukong and others learned that red boy had gone to huoyun cave. Wukong and others came to huoyun cave and found that red boy and mengmo were friends and enemies. Therefore, Wukong and others could only use force to subdue red boy. After defeating mengmo and red boy, Wukong and others took red boy back to banana cave. Princess Tiefan kept her promise and lent the banana fan to Wukong. Wukong fanned out the fire in Flame Mountain with the banana fan. Then Wukong and others continued to embark on the journey of learning scriptures.

Chapter 4 defeat Baigujing three times


Wukong and others came to the boundary of skeleton mountain. There was a cunning Baigujing. In order to eat Tang Monk's meat, Baigujing turned into a peasant daughter, mother and father, deceived Tang Monk and alienated Tang monk from Wukong. Finally, Wukong was driven away by Tang monk. Wukong knelt down to his master and finally left. After Wukong left, Baigujing appeared to ridicule Tang Monk and others and captured Tang Monk and others. Only Bajie escaped. Bajie was not Baigujing's opponent. In order to save his master, Bajie came to Huaguo Mountain to ask the eldest martial brother Sun Wukong for help. Sun Wukong ignored his past grievances and went to rescue his master together with Bajie. Baigujing was Wukong's opponent and was defeated by Wukong, After Wukong rescued his master, he was ready to leave. Tang Monk apologized to Wukong and asked him to stay. After some words, Wukong was very moved. Wukong decided to continue to defend Tang Monk and go to learn scriptures. After the rest of the teachers and disciples, he continued to embark on the journey of learning Scriptures.

Chapter 5 subdues three monsters in Chechi country


Wukong and others came to the boundary of Chechi state and saw a group of Taoists bullying a group of monks. Wukong saved the monks and talked with the Taoists and monks. They learned that there were three demons in Chechi state who would call the wind and rain to bewitch the king of Chechi state. The three demons stigmatized the monks and blamed him for the drought in Chechi state. Wukong was determined to help the monks wash away their grievances and eliminate the demons, so Wukong and others first teased three demons in sanxingguan, and then fought with them. Finally, the demons jumped over the wall and started to fight with Wukong and others. After Wukong and others defeated the demons, the demons showed their original shape. The original three demons were changed by three demons: tiger, deer and sheep, and the king of Chechi suddenly realized, Knowing that they were deceived by the demons, Wukong and others successfully helped the monks wash away their grievances. After Wukong and others rested, they continued to embark on the journey of learning scriptures.

Chapter 6 burning pan silk hole


Wukong and others came to the boundary of Pansi cave. Tang Monk went to make fortune and mistakenly entered the trap of spider essence. As a result, they were caught by spider essence. After some exploration, Wukong and others found the cave of spider essence. So Wukong and others came to Pansi cave where spider essence hid. In the cave, Wukong and others fought with spider essence. Finally, spider essence was beaten away. Wukong and others successfully rescued master, Later, Wukong and others set fire to the Pansi cave. Finally, after Wukong and others rested, they continued to embark on the journey of learning scriptures.

Chapter 7 exterminating centipede monsters


Wukong and others came to a Taoist temple in the boundary of centipede ridge. In the Taoist temple, Monk Tang's teachers and disciples were tricked by centipede essence and drank poisonous tea. Only Wukong was not poisoned. Wukong escaped from the Taoist temple with his master and younger martial brothers. Later, Wukong was instructed by the Baicao fairy to go to Baicao cave to find the elixir that can detoxify all poisons. After finding the elixir, Wukong detoxified the master and younger martial brothers immediately, After that, Wukong and others went to the centipede cave to exterminate the goblins. In the centipede cave, Wukong and others met the spider goblins and centipede goblins. After a fight, Wukong and others exterminated the goblins. After Wukong and others had a good rest, they continued to embark on the journey of learning scriptures.

Chapter 8 Monkey King stealing treasure in Pingdingshan


Wukong and others came to the boundary of Pingdingshan and met the king of golden horn and the king of silver horn. The two monsters captured the Tang monk with demonic methods. After some exploration, Wukong learned that the king of golden horn and the king of silver horn were hiding in the lotus cave and that the monsters had several magic weapons in their hands. Then Wukong went to the lotus cave to subdue the demons, Wukong cheated the monsters out of their magic weapons, then beat them away and rescued Tang Monk and others. After some exploration, Wukong and others learned that the monsters had fled to the fox cave, so Wukong and others went to the fox cave to subdue the monsters. In the cave, Wukong and others met the king of Golden Horn, the king of silver horn and the fox spirit. Wukong and others fought with the monsters and defeated several monsters, After the rest, Wukong and others embarked on the journey of learning scriptures.

Chapter 9 xiaoleiyin Temple


Wukong and others came to xiaoleiyin temple and met the Yellow eyebrow king who pretended to be the Buddha of the Tathagata. The Yellow eyebrow king had two magic weapons in his hand, one was the race bag and the other was jinrao. The Yellow eyebrow King defeated and trapped Wukong with these two treasures. Then Bajie invited heavenly soldiers and generals to help save Wukong. Finally, Wukong got the help of Maitreya Buddha and subdued the king Huangmei. After Wukong and others had a good rest, they continued to embark on the journey of learning scriptures.

Chapter 10 eliminate Python monsters in Qijue mountain


Wukong and others came to the boundary of Qijue mountain and met the python spirit with high magic power and special cunning. The python Spirit captured the Tang monk with a trick. After some hard exploration, Wukong and others found the monster's cave. After a fierce fight, Wukong defeated the python spirit and rescued the master. After they had a good rest, they continued on their way.

Chapter 11 fighting leopard monsters in Wuyin mountain


Wukong and others came to the boundary of Wuyin mountain and met the monster king of Nanshan on the mountain. The king of Nanshan is a leopard spirit with good mana and special cunning. The king of Nanshan cheated Wukong and captured the Tang monk by luring the tiger away from the mountain. When Wukong came back, he found that the Tang Monk had been caught, so he knew that he had been caught by the monster, Finally, after some exploration, Wukong and others found the cave of King Nanshan and went into the cave to defeat the king Nanshan. After rescuing master in the cave, Wukong and others had a rest, and then went on their way.

Chapter 12 shituoling


Wukong and others came to the boundary of Shituo mountain and met Princess peacock. Princess peacock reminded Wukong and others not to pass through Shituo mountain, because there are three powerful monsters on the mountain. Wukong is not afraid at all. For the safety of master, Wukong decided to subdue the monsters first, and then let the teachers go up the mountain. On his way to subdue demons, Wukong met little diamond wind to patrol the mountain. Wukong caught little diamond wind and asked little diamond wind to take him to the monster's cave. Then Wukong came to the monster's cave and fought fiercely with the lion spirit and white elephant spirit in the cave. Finally, Wukong beat the two monsters away. Dapeng Jing took advantage of Wukong's absence to catch the Tang monk. When Wukong came back, he found that the master was gone, so he and his younger martial brothers searched everywhere for another nest of monsters. After some search, he learned that Dapeng Jing was in the lion camel city. Then Wukong and his younger martial brothers went to the lion camel city to rescue the master. When they arrived in the lion camel City, Wukong and others fought fiercely with Dapeng Jing, lion Jing and white elephant Jing. Finally, they fought in the Tathagata Buddha With the help of Manjusri Bodhisattva and Puxian Bodhisattva, they finally subdued the three monsters. Finally, Wukong and others rescued master and took a rest. After the rest, Wukong and others went on their way.

Chapter 13 subdue the green bull monster in Jindou cave


Wukong and others came to the boundary of Jindou cave. Bajie and others sneaked into the house of the green bull monster while Wukong went out to Huayuan and put on the monster's clothes. As a result, they fell into the monster's plan. All the teachers and disciples were captured by the monster. After Wukong Huayuan came back, he found that the master and younger martial brothers were missing and immediately looked around for the whereabouts of the master and younger martial brothers, After some exploration, he finally found the cave of the green bull monster. The green bull monster had a magic weapon in his hand that could suck away the enemy's weapons. Wukong was defeated, so he had to go to the heaven to move the rescue soldiers. Finally, with the help of the supreme Lao Jun, Wukong finally subdued the green bull monster and rescued the master and younger martial brothers. After the rest, the teachers and disciples continued on their way.

Chapter 14 subduing rhinoceros monsters in Xuanying cave


Wukong and others came to Xuanying cave in Qinglong mountain. Tang Monk and others mistakenly entered the temple controlled by the monster while Wukong went out for alms. As a result, Tang monk was captured by the monster. When Wukong came back, he found that master was missing and immediately searched everywhere for master's whereabouts. Finally, Wukong came to Xuanying cave and met three rhinoceros spirits who captured Tang monk. However, rhinoceros spirits were very powerful and Wukong was invincible, Finally, with the help of SIMU Xingjun, Wukong finally defeated three rhinoceros and rescued his master. After that, Wukong and others continued on their way after their rest.

Chapter 15 obtaining scriptures in Lingshan


Wukong and others finally came to the great Leiyin temple. Under the instruction of the Tathagata Buddha, Wukong and others went to the holy mountain to fight with the Buddhas. Wukong and others finally passed the final test and obtained the qualification to obtain scriptures. Finally, the Tang Monk and disciples finally obtained the Scriptures and achieved good results.

short_description: This game takes Sun Wukong, Tang monk, pig Bajie, sand monk and little white dragon as the protagonists. It tells the story of their journey to the west to learn scriptures, going through difficulties and dangers, subduing demons and subduing demons, and finally obtaining the Scriptures.
